attributes.action: To reduce the value of the 'interview suit' clothing voucher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The govt are giving out vouchers for £300 of our own money to the unemployed to be redeemed against suits, shirts, smart trousers etc.

The amount of £300 is far too steep. People can get a reasonable suit, shirt and tie for under £100 and still does the job of making the candidate looking smart for the interview
